title: Powers, Vol. 3: Little Deaths
description: A selection of Powers' most intriguing and salacious stories to date, plus an explosive gathering of some of the most hard-to-find Powers material. Included in this volume are the stories "Groupies," a super-hero sex scandal like you have never seen before; "Ride Along," a tale starring Warren Ellis as himself; the very first reprinting of the entire Powers Wizard Edition; the complete, critically-acclaimed Powers Annual; and the Powers Coloring & Activity Book. Also inside, "Keys," a bonus crime story, plus a dazzling Mike Avon Oeming sketchbook, a cover gallery, an in-depth interview with Brian Michael Bendis and a brand new cover by Oeming.
author: Brian Michael Bendis
